resources.string: 这是一个开头，哈哈哈！java is a language which the best of world. so if you want to advance 突然来个中文, you must to learn more about it ,再来一个惊喜 and you will be a good programer in IT AREA.Buy the way,we should always to keey our attention on the new AREA ,because so much infomation bounch in our life ! That is my advice of my worklife ,enjoy it together !这是文末的彩蛋

loadClass()封装了前面提到的代理模式的实现。 该方法会首先调用 findLoadedClass()方法来检查该类是否已经被加载过； 如果没有加载过的话，会调用父类加载器的 loadClass()方法来尝试加载该类； 如果父类加载器无法加载该类的话，就调用 findClass()方法来查找该类。 因此，为了保证类加载器都正确实现代理模式，在开发自己的类加载器时， 最好不要覆写 loadClass()方法，而是覆写 findClass()方法。 最后通过 defineClass()方法来把这些字节代码转换成 java.lang.Class类的实例

This text fades in and out.

A dissolve creates a smooth transition between elements that completely overlap one another, such as photos inside a card or other container. A foreground element fades in (appears) or out (disappears) to show or hide an element behind it.

Fade through involves one element fading out completely before a new one fades in. These transitions can be applied to text, icons, and other elements that don\'t perfectly overlap. This technique lets the background show through during a transition, and it can provide continuity between screens when paired with a shared transformation.
A floating action button (FAB) can transform into a card by tweening FAB size and corner radius.
Motion makes it clear when items are selected and what will happen when they’re released.

Stagger refers to applying temporal offsets to a group of elements in sequence, like a list. Stagger creates a cascade effect that focuses attention briefly on each item. It can reveal significant content or highlight affordances within a group.
Motion provides timely feedback and the status of user actions. An animated placeholder UI can indicate that content is loading.

Oscillation occurs when an animation uses more than one overshoot. Each additional back and forth movement is smaller than the previous one, until the motion stops. Oscillation may be used to create a cartoon style.

A transition may include a focal element, which is a persistent element significant to the hierarchy that can be tweened. Like animated containers, focal elements enhance continuity by seamlessly transforming their appearance.
To simplify overlapping motion, consider substituting a focal element with a fade through transition.
